title: How should I do my online K-pop audition? I'm doing vocals, but do I introduce myself or tell them how long I was singing for? - Quora

response.answer_text: All these answers suck ngl For your online audition, do as much as you can, sing, dance rap, etc Yes you should do a bried introduction English Hello, my name is -.-.- and I am -.-.- years old. I am from -.-.-. And i will be singing “-.-.-.” Korean 안녕하세요, 제이름은 -.-.-..—.이고 저는 -.-.-살입니다. 저는 -.-에서 살고있고 -.-.-라는 노래를 부를겁니다. Annyeonghaseyo, je ireum eun *your name* igo, jeoneun *your age plus one* salimnida. Jeoneun *country you live in* eseo salgoitgo *song title(for vocal)* raneun norae reul bureulgeobnida. Hello, my name is … and I am …years old. I live in … and I will sing a song called… I don’t think you have to tell them how long you’re planning to sing for, just sing the climax of the song or a chorus Hope this helped!

If you are going to do a self-introduction, It would be best to first, do it in Korean. Even if you have to use google translate, or have a friend translate it for you, this will also show to the company that you have an interest in the language. I would first, say your name, then nationality, then say “today I will be singing _______” You do not need to tell them how long you will be singing for because they will have a general idea from the video length. also, if you do decide to do it in Korean pronunciation is key! you do not want to start mumbling and have them not understand a single word you are saying. I hope this helped you!!!
